description: This file defines an interface and an in-memory implementation for a transactions repository in a Kotlin expense tracking application. It manages transaction items through add, update, delete, and replace operations using StateFlow for reactive data observation.

classes.name: InMemoryTransactionsRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory implementation of the TransactionsRepository interface with initial seed data.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new transaction; generates UUID if id is blank and returns the added item.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction by id, returns true if successful.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a transaction by id, returns true if deleted.

methods.name: replaceAll
methods.description: Replaces the current list of items with a new list.
